item.title: FAQ
item.description: Frequently asked questions What’s available offline? Campground data itself is stored on the device, so it is always available offline. Obviously any internet resource such as websites would not be available offline. The app uses the device’s native map technology so map availability depends on the device. For example for Android, Google Maps allows you to save maps of an area for offline use which would be available in Kampnik.

item.title: Credits
item.description: Credits The Kampnik apps and related websites where built with these resources that deserve attribution for their contribution. Photos Photo by Luca Bravo on Unsplash Photo by Teddy Kelley on Unsplash Photo by Wolfgang Moritzer on Unsplash Photo by Glen Jackson on Unsplash Graphics The Noun Project Building Icon by Lil Squid Launcher Icon - Inspired by Michael Cook’s work Tools and Services This site is built with Hugo This source code is hosted on Github

item.title: EULA
item.description: Kampnik End User Licensing Agreement Effective on July 30, 2014 This End User License Agreement (“EULA”) is a legal agreement between you (an individual or an entity) and Keezo LLC (“Keezo”). This EULA governs your use of the Software (as specified below). For purposes of this EULA “Software” defines the Kampnik app as well as any and all files bundled with the Kampnik app including, but not limited to database, asset, and graphic files.

item.title: Help
item.description: Help Map The main view of the app is a map that you can move and zoom in or out. Tap on a campground marker to view it’s detail card. Campground markers are color coded by type: National Park, National Forest, State Park, etc. To see a full list of campground types and their color codes, see the Campground Details section. The number of campgrounds displayed at one time is limited for performance, so if you zoom out too far only campgrounds closest to the center of the map will be displayed.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy Policy Effective on March 16, 2015 This privacy policy describes how Keezo LLC (Keezo) collects and uses information from its Kampnik app and website software. We may collect the following information about you Usage information about how you interact with our software. Device information which may include IP address and serial number. We may use this information to Improve our software by analyzing how it is being used.
